issue.title: [C++] DictionaryBuilder provides information to determine array builder type at run-time
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5355](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5355). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is needed for Arrow GLib. In Arrow GLib, we need to determine how to wrap Arrow C++ `ArrayBuilder` at run-time. `ArrayBuilder` may be passed as a generic `ArrayBuilder` instead of concrete `DictionaryBuilder`. (e.g. `RecordBatchBuilder::GetField()`)

See also: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4316#issuecomment-492995395
